home.heroTyping: I build efficient, elegant and maintainable interfaces with Angular & NG Zorro.
home.heroSubtitle: Computer Engineer · Frontend Developer · Proactive, creative and results-oriented.

education.title: My technical and academic background
education.cfgs: Higher Technician in Administration and Finance

about.title: My way of working
about.main: I'm a computer engineer passionate about frontend development and elegant solutions. I describe myself as proactive, enthusiastic and a fast learner, used to teamwork and facing new challenges with creativity and precision. I enjoy turning complex requirements into clear, accessible and maintainable interfaces, relying on best practices, clean architecture and modern tools.

philosophy.efficiency: Efficiency and performance as a standard.

epigram.fullstack: Development of web and desktop applications in Full Stack architecture.
epigram.backend: Backend with .NET Core (C#) and RESTful API design.
epigram.frontend: Frontend in Angular + NG Zorro, integrating reactive logic with RxJS.
epigram.docker: Container and environment management with Docker.
epigram.analysis: Active participation in analysis meetings, functional definition and technical design.

torrecid.migration: Responsible for the complete migration of a business application to the latest version of Angular.
torrecid.ui: Development of reusable, accessible and responsive interfaces with NG Zorro.
torrecid.architecture: Application of modular architecture, lazy loading and reactive patterns with RxJS.
torrecid.refactor: Legacy code refactoring improving maintainability and technical standards.

other.message: You've worked since you were young, you're responsible, resourceful and have a strong work ethic.
